snippet: The pianist Yefim Bronfman performed Beethoven’s “Emperor” concerto with the orchestra.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews performance by Metropolitan Opera Orchestra, featuring violinist David Chan and pianist Yefim Bronfman, at Carnegie Hall.
lead_paragraph: The pianist Yefim Bronfman performed Beethoven’s “Emperor” concerto with the orchestra.

headline.print_headline: No Time Like the Present to Take Flight
headline.seo: Met Opera Orchestra With David Chan and Yefim Bronfman
headline.main: No Time Like the Present to Take Flight
